entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 12. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of light snow overnight. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light overnight. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Snow. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Snow beginning in the afternoon. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 18 February 2023
